name: Lockdown (muttorpaneer)
description:
Lockdown is a small mini-game project based on the current pandemic of COVID-19.

Press "WASD" or "Arrow keys" to move.

Story:

There is lockdown in the city because of COVID-19. But you have to go work. You have to avoid the police and coronavirus itself along the way.

You get a random gift from Bhoos Entertainment (Your Company). Use that one of the gifts to avoid obstacles on your way.

Gifts:

Pass - Avoid the police with a fake pass to go further (one time use)

Face Mask - Wear the mask to be invincible to COVID-19

Sanitizer - Use the sanitizer to avoid coronavirus (one time use)

Hope you like this mini-game that we made!

Thank you for playing and stay safe! Don' t forget to put your mask on!

Cheers!!!
